#FROM gcr.io/oss-fuzz-base/base-builder
FROM gaoxiang9430/fix2fit

MAINTAINER vmalvarez@google.com
RUN \
  apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
  automake \
  autoconf \
  make \
  libtool && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/VirusTotal/yara.git
COPY build.sh $SRC/
WORKDIR yara

COPY testcase /testcase
COPY yara /src/yara
COPY project_build.sh /src/yara/project_build.sh
COPY project_config.sh /src/yara/project_config.sh
